column4: ......Where would I make a complaint about a stupid package resolution problem in apt?
or at least I think I am
removing the metapackage ubuntu-desktop, does that then make apt want to delete my whole system any time I upgrade, etc?
eh.....oh well, I'll just play crawl without sdl tiles enabled
D: Never heard of DCSS. To google!
I noticed. Didn't think I'd find another ASCII dungeon crawler :p
if you haven't checked out doomrl you should ^_^
My brother goes on it, haven't checked it out myself
doomrl is a really fun coffeebreak rl. Dwarf Fortress......is...well....dwarf fortress. The most complicated and hard roguelike around.
I actually started it up once; took an hour to generate the world; way too long for me
